body: Is there gonna be a chapter 2?
Hahahaha hahahaha wat a cuck 🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣I don't even feel sorry
Haruta doesn't stand a chance with a girl like her, the sooner he realizes that the sooner he can go his own way

I'm guessing the NTR could be argued to be when Haruta, the MC, feels like he was being unfaithful in his big sis relationship and wanted to say I love you to Rio, not knowing she was already with some other guy? Ehh.. that's all I could understand if it could be considered even a little bit NTR. If you were to ask me, I wouldnt consider this an NTR, or if this were NTR, not a good one. But that's fine with me, I don't really enjoy NTR unless the MC finds a way to escape or get revenge (In a non gory way).

I enjoyed the story. But uh this isn't NTR at all, or even a little bit in my opinion. I wasn't searching up NTR content but I see people complaining about it not being necessarily an NTR and looked at the tags. It's just a shy kid named Haruta who didn't have the courage to shoot his shot and the girl ended falling for the other dude, and the other dude GAVE the option that him and the girl should stop having sex so he could return to Haruta. The girl says no. Her choice. The MC a pusssyyyyy. Anyways, it's nice simple story concept which I actually enjoyed. Once again, not NTR. (Posting this in other translations of this doujin)

So here’s the lesson of every NTR story:

Tell the girl you fucking want her. Nearly every NTR story is “hey - that girl you like? If you don’t tell her you love her, some other jackass does.”

I swear every time I date a girl some guy I know is all “how did you get her to go out with you?” 

I opened my fucking mouth and asked her instead of “oh but what if she doesn’t like me that way or says no?”
